exercise_plan.name: Strength training
exercise_plan.description: Focus on major muscle groups using free weights, resistance bands, or body weight. Exercises like squats, bench presses, and deadlifts are effective.

exercise_plan.name: Cardio
exercise_plan.description: Incorporate moderate-intensity cardio exercises to help maintain cardiovascular health while not overly burning calories necessary for muscle gain.

diet_plan.description: Puttu (steamed rice cake with coconut) and Kadala Curry (black chickpeas curry) - Provides a high-carb, moderate-protein, and fiber-rich meal.
Sadya meal (portion control: 2 cups rice, small amounts of Sambar, Aviyal, and Thoran) with added grilled fish for protein.
Chicken stew with Appam - High protein, and moderate carb meal, useful for muscle repair and growth after workouts.
